    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>ILMoE</catalog>
            <entry>ILMoE2086</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="en">Content units for Science teaching in the Junior High School</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Zufriedene Maßeinheiten für Wissenschaft 
Unterricht in der Juniorhigh School</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Unités contentes pour l'enseignement de la 
Science dans le lycée junior</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Unidades satisfeitas para o ensino da ciência na
High School júnior</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Unità soddisfatte per insegnamento di scienza 
nella 'junior high school'</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Ικανοποιημένες μονάδες για τη διδασκαλία επιστήμης στο
κατώτερο γυμνάσιο</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Unidades contentas para la enseñanza de la 
ciencia en la High School secundaria menor</string>
          </title>
          <language>en</language>
          <description>
            <string language="en">This is a diagram of suggested content units for teaching Scinece in the 7th,8th and 9th grades.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">sciences</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">junior high</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">content units</string>
          </keyword>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Dieses ist ein Diagramm der vorgeschlagenen 
zufriedenen Maßeinheiten für das Unterrichten von von Scinece in den
7., 8. und 9. Graden.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">C'est un diagramme des unités contentes 
suggérées pour enseigner Scinece dans les 7èmes, 8èmes et 9èmes 
catégories.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Este é um diagrama de unidades satisfeitas 
sugeridas para ensinar Scinece nas 7as, ås e 9as classes.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Ciò è uno schema delle unità soddisfatte 
suggerite per l'istruzione dello Scinece nei settimo, ottavi e noni 
gradi.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Αυτό είναι ένα διάγραμμα των προτεινόμενων 
ικανοποιημένων μονάδων για τη διδασκαλία Scinece στις 7ες, 8ες 
και 9ες τάξεις.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Éste es un diagrama de las unidades contentas 
sugeridas para enseñar Scinece en los 7mos, 8vos y 9nos grados.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Wissenschaften</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Juniorhöhe</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">zufriedene Maßeinheiten</string>
          </keyword>

          </keyword>

          </keyword>

          </keyword>
          <keyword>

          <keyword>
